str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Apparently from ereo; to interrogate; by implication, to request.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and kathistemi; to reconstitute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.
